article.headline: Bank of America Corp. stock outperforms market despite losses on the day
article.body: Shares of Bank of America Corp. BAC, +0.47% slid 1.02% to $24.37 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% falling 1.40% to 3,360.97 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% falling 1.34% to 27,772.76. The stock's fall snapped a four-day winning streak. Bank of America Corp. closed $11.35 short of its 52-week high ($35.72), which the company achieved on December 27th. Despite its losses, the stock outperformed some of its competitors Tuesday, as JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM, -0.57% fell 1.03% to $98.02, Wells Fargo & Co. WFC, fell 1.10% to $24.18, and Citigroup Inc. C, +0.47% fell 1.11% to $44.41. Trading volume (66.9 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 56.4 M.
